snippet: Cyprus's close proximity to Greece made the expansion of Cypriot banks into the country appear to be a good idea. Now, the Greek debt crisis has exposed the perils of that strategy.
abstract: Cyprus's close proximity to Greece made the expansion of Cypriot banks into the country appear to be a good idea. Now, the Greek debt crisis has exposed the perils of that strategy.

headline.main: Greek Crisis Leaves Cyprus Mired in Debt
